item.description:
RSVP closed. We will be there by 6 pm.

Please update your RSVP by Wednesday, April 28 and include your full name to be added to our guest list.

We have arranged a special Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge for Red Sox Natives.

Join the Red Sox Natives and other groups for a Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge and Burger Bar from 5pm to 10pm on Thursday, April 29.

This event includes up to 4 hours of complimentary food buffet and cash bar. (Prior nights have included marinated steak tips, assorted sliders, fresh pastas, spicy buffalo wings, king crab meat lollipops, and crab cakes with menu items subject to change)

Admission is FREE for those who RSVP to the Natives site with their FULL FIRST and Last Names for the Guest List which will be submitted 1 day prior to the event. Please follow these directions. Space is limited as we are sharing the venue with another huge group. Please do not RSVP unless you will be attending. Maybe RSVPs are not being accepted. Natives who RSVP yes and fail to attend will be considered for removal from the Natives group.

Splash has a Dress Code: Dress to impress, no sneakers, t-shirts or hats.

All Guests must be at least 21 plus with proper ID

Nearest MBTA stop is South Station or China Town.

Metered street parking is available in the area.

Valet parking is $20.00

www.splash-boston.com

www.bostoneventguide.com

We will send out a confirmation E Mail with meeting instructions 1 day before the event to those Natives who make the Guest List. You may arrive any time.
item.name: Rush Hour at Splash Sponsored by Boston Event Guide for Red Sox Natives
